name: James_M._Cain
text:
James M. Cain
James M. Cain was the author of Double Indemnity.
Behind the scenes
James M. Cain (July 1, 1892 – October 27, 1977) was an American writer who began his career as a journalist until making the transition into a novelist, penning works such as The Postman Always Rings Twice and Double Indemnity.
